title: Japan's Suga pledges not to wage war again as ministers visit controversial shrine
content:
1. Japan's Suga pledges not to wage war again as ministers visit controversial shrine  Reuters
  2. Two Japan Cabinet members visit controversial Yasukuni Shrine on war anniversary  Arirang News
  3. 3 Cabinet members visit Yasukuni shrine, PM Suga sends offering  Kyodo News Plus
  4. China boycotts actor after photos of visit to Japan's Yasukuni Shrine  Reuters
  5. Japan marks 76th anniversary of WWII defeat; no Suga apology  Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 閣僚による神社参拝で「二度と戦争をしない」と宣言した菅総理
日本部长访问有争议的神社时，菅义伟承诺不会再次发动战争
日本部長訪問有爭議的神社時，菅義偉承諾不會再次發動戰爭
